description: Pleasant snowshoe through the trees , with many more trails in the area.  Easy to get turned around , take gps or map , compass .  Nice fire pit at a location mid trail  at N50° 09.632' W119° 05.303' . Directions:Heading east from Vernon BC on Hwy 6 towards Lavington  Turn south on School Road.  East on Learmouth Road onto Bluenose Road which will turn into Forest Service Road head down to 9km generally were the plowed section of the road ends and your at the parking  spot.
title: Aberdeen Snowshoe
